The sample project

With this project, every time I change and save the pom I get the following error in the main eclipse window

org.eclipse.buckminster.core.metadata.MissingComponentException: No component named junit/[3.8.1,3.9.a)#Triplet is known to Buckminster
	at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.metadata.WorkspaceInfo.getResolution(WorkspaceInfo.java:316)
	at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.metadata.ModelCache.findCSpec(ModelCache.java:60)
	at org.eclipse.buckminster.jdt.internal.BMClasspathContainer.addNodeToClassPath(BMClasspathContainer.java:106)
	at org.eclipse.buckminster.jdt.internal.BMClasspathContainer.<init>(BMClasspathContainer.java:46)
	at org.eclipse.buckminster.jdt.internal.BMClasspathInitializer.initialize(BMClasspathInitializer.java:56)
	at org.eclipse.buckminster.jdt.internal.BMClasspathInitializer.resourceChanged(BMClasspathInitializer.java:84)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager$2.run(NotificationManager.java:282)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.notify(NotificationManager.java:276)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.broadcastChanges(NotificationManager.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.broadcastBuildEvent(Workspace.java:296)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.doBuild(AutoBuildJob.java:154)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.run(AutoBuildJob.java:224)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)


But actually the underlying error is a ClassCastException in Maven2ResolutionBuilder:66 because "reader" is an instance of LocalReader and not Maven2Reader

So two things, how to solve the error, and improvement of the error logging so the actual cause shows up.
